title: Member Poems
subtitle: Welcome to the “Poems” section, an open platform for publication and exchange. Registered poets can share their works and engage in discussions here. Not limited to scientific poetry, all styles and genres are welcome, and both Chinese and English poems can be freely published.

becomeFeaturedAuthor.title: How to become a featured author?
becomeFeaturedAuthor.steps:
1. Log in or register an account.
2. Submit your application in the Profile section.
3. Wait for admin approval. Approved accounts will have their works featured in the top authors list.
